thread.title: As MLB postseason lengthens, outfielders outfitted as skiers
thread.title_full: As MLB postseason lengthens, outfielders outfitted as skiers

title: As MLB postseason lengthens, outfielders outfitted as skiers
text: As MLB postseason lengthens, outfielders outfitted as skiers Thursday, 22 October 2015 (5 minutes ago) Joe Maddon walked to the mound in a ski cap. Yoenis Cespedes wore a balaclava. As baseball's postseason keeps getting longer, the Boys of Summer are starting to resemble skiers on a Steamboat Springs lift line.
